description: Keep your camp clear of pesky mosquitos without needing to put anything on your skin. By using the same gas canister as most backpacking stoves the Backpacker Mosquito Repeller is an easy to use, scent free defense against mosquitos. Simply place the Backpacker on your picnic table, by your hammock, or anywhere you would like to be mosquito-free, turn it on and within minutes you will have a 5m dome of protection. Turning the Repeller on and off is easy and each colour-coded mat provides up to 4 hours of protection.5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes.Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat.Works with most (iso)butane and propane fuel mix (product will not function with 100% propane).Fuel efficient: up to 90 hours of run time on a 4 oz gas canister and up to 360 hours on a 16 oz gas canister.Simple on/off lever and ignition slider are easy to use.No open flame, smouldering coil or scent.Compact design is easy to take with you.Active ingredient: D-cis/trans allethrin.Dimensions: 9.7 x 6.7cm.In the box: 1 Backpacker Mosquito Repeller and 3 repellent mats (12 hours of protection).
name: Thermacell Backpacker's Pack Repeller
